snippet.title: Zoeti | Gameplay Reveal
snippet.description:
Wishlist Zoeti Today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1434540/Zoeti/

Get a first look at the gameplay of Zoeti, hosted by Community Manager Buddy Sola!

Zoeti is a turn-based roguelike that features a deck of playing cards to create card combos to activate skills in the heat of battle. Bolster your arsenal of skills through battles, discoverable upgrades, or aid from the locals which enhance your plays to overcome the evil plaguing your land.

To learn more about Zoeti, Akupara Games, and Dusklight Games visit:
►Dusklight Games: https://en.dusklightgames.com/
►Akupara Games: linktr.ee/akuparagames
►Zoeti: https://linktr.ee/zoeti
